source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
      [No_],
      [Sell-to Customer No_],
      [Bill-to Customer No_],
      replace([Bill-to Name], '''', ' ') as [Bill-to Name],
      replace([Bill-to Name 2], '"', ' ') as [Bill-to Name 2],
      replace([Bill-to Address], ',', ' ') as [Bill-to Address],
      [Posting Date],
      [Shipment Date],
      [Location Code],
      [Shortcut Dimension 1 Code],
      [Shortcut Dimension 2 Code],
      [Shipping Agent Code],
      [LR_RR No_],
      [LR_RR Date],
      [Vehicle No_],
      [Vehicle Type],
      [Route Code],
      [Customer Category],
      [ECOM],
      [Last Modified On],
       'AP' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Sales Invoice Header]
WHERE year([Posting Date])=2020 
UNION ALL
SELECT 
      [No_],
      [Sell-to Customer No_],
      [Bill-to Customer No_],
      replace([Bill-to Name], '''', ' ') as [Bill-to Name],
      replace([Bill-to Name 2], '"', ' ') as [Bill-to Name 2],
      replace([Bill-to Address], ',', ' ') as [Bill-to Address],
      [Posting Date],
      [Shipment Date],
      [Location Code],
      [Shortcut Dimension 1 Code],
      [Shortcut Dimension 2 Code],
      [Shipping Agent Code],
      [LR_RR No_],
      [LR_RR Date],
      [Vehicle No_],
      [Vehicle Type],

      [ECOM],
      [Last Modified On],
	 'CHE' as Site_Code
